languages.text: "Так же "исчезали" на Эурак-V плебсы, прислуживающие Дому Орселлио. Верные слуги на службе славной династии — зачем бы им возвращаться в свои грязные, убогие дома?"

"Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"
languages.original_text: "Так же "исчезали" на Эурак-V плебсы, прислуживающие Дому Орселлио. Верные слуги на службе славной династии — зачем бы им возвращаться в свои грязные, убогие дома?"

"Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家に仕えるためにユーラック・Vに連れて行かれた農民たちは、その後、誰も姿を見ることも消息を聞くこともありませんでした。彼らは忠実なしもべとして仕え、偉大な王朝のために働きました。そんな彼らが、なぜ汚れた、不潔な住処に戻る必要があるのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家に仕えるためにユーラック・Vに連れて行かれた農民たちは、その後、誰も姿を見ることも消息を聞くこともありませんでした。彼らは忠実なしもべとして仕え、偉大な王朝のために働きました。そんな彼らが、なぜ汚れた、不潔な住処に戻る必要があるのでしょう？」

languages.text: « Les paysans qui ont été emmenés sur Eurac-V pour se mettre au service de la maison Orsellio n'ont plus jamais donné signe de vie. Ils sont devenus de loyaux serviteurs, travaillant d'arrache-pied pour le bien d'une grande dynastie. Pourquoi auraient-ils voulu revenir dans leurs taudis ? »
languages.original_text: "Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

traits.locale_text: « Les paysans qui ont été emmenés sur Eurac-V pour se mettre au service de la maison Orsellio n'ont plus jamais donné signe de vie. Ils sont devenus de loyaux serviteurs, travaillant d'arrache-pied pour le bien d'une grande dynastie. Pourquoi auraient-ils voulu revenir dans leurs taudis ? »

languages.text: “那些被带到欧拉克五号星站，为奥赛罗家族效力的仆人，也都同样再也没有回来过。那些人都成了忠实的仆人，为伟大王朝的利益辛勤劳作。像这样的人，还有什么理由回到这肮脏、鄙俗的居所呢？”
languages.original_text: "Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

traits.locale_text: “那些被带到欧拉克五号星，为奥塞罗家族效力的仆人，也都同样再也没有回来过。那些人都成了忠实的仆人，为伟大王朝的利益辛勤劳作。像这样的人，还有什么理由回到这肮脏、鄙俗的居所呢？”

languages.text: «Tampoco se ha vuelto a ver a los plebeyos que se llevaron a Eurac V para servir a la casa Orsellio. Si tanta pleitesía rinden a una dinastía de renombre y tanto velan por su bien, ¿para qué iban a volver a esos cuchitriles que tenían por morada?».
languages.original_text: "Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

traits.locale_text: «Tampoco se ha vuelto a ver a los plebeyos que se llevaron a Eurac V para servir a la casa Orsellio. Si tanta pleitesía rinden a una dinastía de renombre y tanto velan por su bien, ¿para qué iban a volver a esos cuchitriles que tenían por morada?».

languages.text: "Einfache Leute, die nach Eurac V gebracht wurden, um dem Haus Orsellio zu dienen, wurden nie wieder gesehen. Sie wurden zu treuen Dienern und trugen durch ihre Arbeit zum Wohle einer großen Dynastie bei. Warum sollten sie je wieder in ihre dreckigen, ärmlichen Behausungen zurückkehren?"
languages.original_text: "Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

traits.locale_text: "Einfache Leute, die nach Eurac V gebracht wurden, um dem Haus Orsellio zu dienen, wurden nie wieder gesehen. Sie wurden zu treuen Dienern und trugen durch ihre Arbeit zum Wohle einer großen Dynastie bei. Warum sollten sie je wieder in ihre dreckigen, ärmlichen Behausungen zurückkehren?"

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'ne hizmet etmeleri için Eurac V'e götürülen insanları da bir daha gören veya duyan olmamıştı. Sadık hizmetkârlar olup büyük bir hanedanlık uğruna ter döktüler. O pis, sefil evlerine neden geri dönmek istesinler ki?"
languages.original_text: "Peasants who were taken to Eurac V to serve House Orsellio were never seen or heard from again either. They became loyal servants and toiled for the good of a great dynasty — why should they ever return to their filthy, squalid abodes?"

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi'ne hizmet etmeleri için Eurac V'e götürülen insanları da bir daha gören veya duyan olmamıştı. Sadık hizmetkârlar olup büyük bir hanedanlık uğruna ter döktüler. O pis, sefil evlerine neden geri dönmek istesinler ki?"
